name: GODS WANTS BLOOD!!!
description:
You waked Up. You started to heer some voice's.

One of them tald you: Destroy the evil Underground monsters! It's US, the GODS!!!

Now, you have to exterminate every monster at Underground kingdom. Great!

*Thats game was created for "LUX GAME JAM" 2020*
*The game, is curently at the alpha , and i gonna still upgrde it!*
*It's my first game, where i use only my assets, scripts and music.*
*It's also my first game-jam*
